One of the more fun and exciting horror multiplayer games to play out with friends or solo going as a killer with a brutal rampage! Highly recommended to anyone that likes survival horror games and besides the Resident Evil chapter is coming soon so another great reason to be excited!

This game is mostly great, every match is different, it pushes you to become better, the PvP chase is exciting, and it has a high skill ceiling. Unfortunately, it has a massive grind, and not a great meta.

First of all i love this game! You can have fun with your friends despite the toxic killers. But there are some issues that bugs me of. 
-Lobby crashes oftenly despite the updates.
-So many bugs such as flash saves won't work even you get the "killer stun point."
-Sometimes game crashes in a match and then gives you penalty even tho you did nothing
-So many toxic players that may kill the vibes. (I don't think that it's developers or the owner's problem but i think they can take some actions about it)

Despite all of these, it's really fun game to play with. like, the adrenalin when Myers grabs you from the gen or looping the killer like it's your last time.
